targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  datname as database, usename as user, client_addr as address, query, (now() - query_start) as running_time
FROM pg_stat_activity

panels.description: Displays stderr logs vs total logs for selected time period.

targets.expr:
sum(count_over_time({app="redis", stream="stderr"} [$__range])) or vector(0)
/
(sum(count_over_time({app="redis"} [$__range])) or vector(1))
